name: PersuadeMe
0:
”Alexa, open Persuade Me.”
”Alexa, launch Persuade Me.”
”Alexa, start Persuade Me.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: persuade me.
des: Persuade Me was created and developed by students in 3rd grade as part of their persuasive writing unit. The 4 topics chosen by the students include; Recycling can help save the planet, Reading is better than TV, Halloween is the best holiday, and Education can change the world.All opinions are those of the student's who created the skill and are not the opinions of Amazon of their affiliates.This skill is covered under the Georgia state standards, specifically: ELAGSEW1. Please support these wonderful innovative students!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
